property.name: Race
property.value: Starnoid/Angel Command/Demon Command

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) {SLAYER} (Whenever this creature battles, destroy the other creature after the battle.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ Whenever your opponent chooses this creature, your opponent discards a card from their hand. ■ Each turn, when a creature attacks a player other than you for the first time, you may shieldify the top card of your deck. Then the attacking creature's owner may draw a card. ■ Each of your spells in your shield zone gets "shield trigger".

property.value: Truth Dragon

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) {POWERED BREAKER} (This creature breaks an additional shield for each 6000 power.) ■ This creature gets +3000 power for each card in your hand. ■ When you put this creature, each opponent discards a card from their hand. For each card discarded in this way, draw a card. ■ Whenever your opponent uses a card that costs 8 or more, you may cast a spell that costs 7 or less from your hand for no cost.

property.value: ONI STAR MAX EVOLUTION When you would lose the game or this creature would leave, you may destroy 3 of your face up cards instead. (This creature doesn't need an evolution source. If you have 2 or more Star Max Evolution Creatures, one of them stays and return the rest to your hand.) {TRIPLE BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature, each player chooses 3 of their shields and puts the rest into their graveyard. ■ Whenever this creature attacks, choose one of your opponent's creatures and destroy them. Then your opponent discards 2 cards at random from their hand.
